channel.title: Connecting
channel.description:
so ive had trouble with this in the past and am here again ive port forwarded and have also tryd using utorrent as a port forward but still my friends cannot connect yes i have no-ip i dont understand please help much appreciated
one other thing if i do put utorrent up it wont connect to local user if that means anything
help? ;(
